name: Typical Workings - The Demo
description:
"Huge gay shitpost that's also pretty whack" - Ray L. Ir (2017)

A typical story about the workings of everyday life that follows the story of Juniper, a young girl going into 10th grade, and her expedition into love and chaos.

Reasons why you should play this demo:

1) Gay

2) Dreamy Romance

3) You get to fight Colonel Sanders

4) You get to fight Colonel Sanders twice.

5) I want to reiterate. YOU GET TO FIGHT COLONEL SANDERS. TWICE

6) Technically you watch Colonel Sanders get beaten up. TWICE

7) Oh also I like to think I'm pretty funny. So's this game (Demo).
